      • generateRankings

        public static org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs[] generateRankings(int M,
                                                                  int n,
                                                                  double p)
        Generates M rankings of n elements using Yang-Stoyanovich process
        Parameters:
        M - how many rankings to generate
        n - how many elements should each ranking have
        p - what is the probabilty
        Returns:
        the generated rankings

      • computeFailureProbability

        public static double computeFailureProbability(int[] mtable,
                                               org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs[] rankings)
        This computes experimentally how many of the M rankings fail to satisfy the MTable
        Parameters:
        mtable - an mtable to check against
        rankings - rankings that are checked
        Returns:
        the ratio of failed rankings
